classes.pageBg: min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-slate-900 via-purple-900 to-slate-900 text-white
classes.card: bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-lg border border-white/20 rounded-2xl shadow-xl p-6
classes.primaryButton: bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-500 to-pink-500 hover:from-purple-400 hover:to-pink-400 text-white font-semibold px-4 py-2 rounded-lg transition-all hover:scale-105
classes.secondaryButton: border border-white/30 hover:bg-white/10 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-lg transition-all
